post.text:
Thank you to President Enrique Pena Nieto - for the invitation to meet with him in Mexico City, Mexico. Wonderful leadership and high quality people! I look forward to our next meeting. 
-Donald J. Trump

comment.author: Taylon
comment.text: You want everyone else to pay for your ideas and seal of our border with another country, thus instigating poor relations and a militarization mentality. This plan is reminiscent of your other failed business ventures, only now we are playing with governments rather than strictly corporations or entrepreneurs. Voting #JohnsonWeld.

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Welcome to the Democratic America. Wanna commit treason? Go ahead! Wanna disrespect the symbol of YOUR nation? Go ahead! It isn't about whether you can or can't. It's about whether you should or shouldn't.

replies.author: Adam
replies.text: Obamacare is Obamas massive disaster! Atnea, Humania and others insurance companies are dropping out! The middle class families can't afford to eat after the monthly premiums. The copays are ridiculous! The middle class are given huge penalties if they can't pay their premiums. Their necessities like electricity, water, housing, food Ect. Should be above healthcare. It's not affordable! Hillary will be worse than Obama. Not only will she raise middle class taxes, she'll raise Obamacare and destroy America. Hillary could not even create jobs in NY. She want even acknowledge that Americans are suffering. Americans want to be put first. Trump will not ignore the cries of the American people. We need change!

replies.author: Brecken
replies.text: How is Gary paying for his campaign? Donors! How will Gary pay for his ideas? Taxpayers! The guy doesn't stand the smallest chance, but you waste your vote if it makes you feel good inside. Trump's multibillionaire status puts your "failed business ventures" argument to rest!
